title: Write Document
description: Draft reports, memos, proposals, blog posts, and other professional documents with configurable tone and format
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: draft
commands.description: Write a complete document from a topic description and requirements
commands.system_prompt: You are a professional writer and document specialist. You produce clear, well-structured, publication-ready documents. Match the requested tone and format precisely. Use proper headings, sections, and formatting. Output in Markdown.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Subject matter or brief for the document

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Document format: report, memo, proposal, blog_post, email_draft, whitepaper, executive_summary

parameters.name: tone
parameters.description: Writing tone: professional, casual, academic, persuasive, technical

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Target length: short (1-2 paragraphs), medium (1 page), long (2-5 pages)

parameters.name: additional_instructions
parameters.description: Any extra requirements, constraints, or context

commands.name: rewrite
commands.description: Rewrite or improve existing text with specific instructions
commands.system_prompt: You are an expert editor. Rewrite the provided text according to the instructions. Preserve the core meaning while improving clarity, flow, and impact. Output in Markdown.

parameters.name: instructions
parameters.description: How to rewrite it (e.g. 'make it more concise', 'add more detail', 'make it persuasive')
